About_me: I am an Asset Integrity Engineer in the Mechanical, Materials and Integrity group Shell P&T Amsterdam. I worked for an LNG plant in Egypt for over 10 years with an Inspection background. I am API 510, 570, 653 and 580 certified also CSWIP WI 3.1. I have experience in materials selection, corrosion , Inspection, Asset Inegrity and also RBI.
